issues.description: The problem statement specifies that the Farm class should use a List<Animal> implemented with an ArrayList, but the solution’s Farm.java declares the animals field as Queue<Animal> (backed by a LinkedList) and its getter/setter return Queue<Animal>. This type mismatch can confuse students and may not satisfy tests expecting List methods and an ArrayList implementation.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the Farm class’s animals field type to List<Animal>, have getAnimals()/setAnimals() use List<Animal>, and initialize it with new ArrayList<>() in the no-arg constructor.
